mapper.select: SELECT b.boardKey AS "boardKey", b.custKey AS "custKey", b.itemKey AS "itemKey", b.ntype AS "ntype", b.title AS "title", b.rdate AS "rdate", b.content AS "content" , b.img AS "img", b.rate AS "rate", i.name AS "name", i.price AS "price" , c.username AS "username", b.rdate AS "rdate" FROM board b JOIN customer c ON c.custKey = b.custKey JOIN item i ON i.itemKey = b.itemKey WHERE b.boardKey = ${boardKey} AND b.ntype='q'
